game.name: / Emulation Tools
game.desc: This folder contains emulator related scripts.

game.name: Front-End selector
game.desc: This script will let you chose what front end to boot into

game.name: +Start Systems
game.desc: Configure Amiberry Amiga, DOSBox PC, DOSBox-SDL2 PC, Reicast, ResidualVM, Scummvm, ZX Spectrum Emulators

game.name: +Start Fuse
game.desc: Configure ZX Spectrum Emulator

game.name: OpenBor Game Autoconfig
game.desc: Set OpenBor default controler config for all game

game.name: OpenBor Module Selection Script
game.desc: Select OpenBOR Module

game.name: N64 Tweaks.
game.desc: The user friendly N64 tweak script.

game.name: +Start DOSBox-SDL2
game.desc: Configure DOSBox-SDL2 PC Emulator

game.name: Clear Last Played
game.desc: The user friendly Game list cleaner By THE SUPREME TEAM

game.name: +Start DOSbox
game.desc: Configure DOSBox PC Emulator

game.name: +Start Reicast
game.desc: Configure Reicast Dreamcast Emulator

game.name: +Start Scummvm
game.desc: Configure Scummvm Emulator

game.name: +Start ResidualVM
game.desc: Configure ResidualVM Emulator

game.name: Amiga Auto Install, HS
game.desc: Enabled on Retropie ! This will install the Amiga required files and folders to work with Amiberry and WHD Load. Retropie has latest Amiberry SDL enabled!

game.name: UAE Congfig Maker, HS
game.desc: After adding your Amiga game files in the corresponding roms/amiga-data/ folder, use this script to create automatic WHD Load config files for your Amiga\CD32 main roms folder!

game.name: Configuration Editor
game.desc: Change common RetroArch options, and manually edit RetroArch configs, global configs, and non-RetroArch configs.

game.name: Dreamcast Date & Time
game.desc: This will enable or disable date & time setting when Reicast starts. Reicast binary by jonsim.

game.name: Switch Genesis-Megadrive
game.desc: This script will switch between the Sega Genesis and the Sega Megadrive themes in both ES and AM to show in the main menu. You will need to restart Emulation Station after making the change. By SUPREME TEAM

game.name: Emulator resolution editor
game.desc: Change your resolution settings for certain emulators with this amzing tool.

game.name: Saves Single Folder, RPC
game.desc: Not enabled on Retropie ! Creates a "saves" directory at ~/RetroPie/saves and configures all RetroArch emulators with their own config files to store savefiles at ~/RetroPie/saves/{system_name} and savestate files at ~/Retropie/saves/{system_name}/states.

game.name: / Controller tools
game.desc: This folder contains contoller related scripts.

game.name: LightGun Aimtrak Install, EZH
game.desc: Enabled on Retropie ! Enables Aimtrack Lightgun support and installs Advance-Mame v1.4. Mouse is supported on Retropie for both Advance-Mame & lr-mame systems/emus.

game.name: LightGun Aimtrak Config, EZH
game.desc: The configuration script created by the Aimtrak script.

game.name: Reset All Controllers
game.desc: It will reset all ES cotroller configurations and remove any previous controller profiles. This will give you a clean controllers setup!

game.name: XinMo & Juyao Dual
game.desc: Enable XIN MO or JUYAO dual Arcade player support as per official Wiki.

game.name: Raspi-Config
game.desc: Change user password, boot options, internationalization, camera, add your Pi to Rastrack, overclock, overscan, memory split, SSH and more.

game.name: / Retropie Tools
game.desc: This folder contains more system related scripts from A-Z.

game.name: Install or Update AM & HW Video Encoding
game.desc: It will install or update your Attract Mode, SFML-Pi & FFMPEG with mmal HW Video Encoding Support. To Enable mmal you need also to set it in the attract.cfg in the general section 'video_decoder mmal'. Can be done also while in AM by pressing TAB.

game.name: ES Pathfinder Custom Collections
game.desc: CygeGhost final release! It compares custom imported collections (by other users) with your Romsets. It will automatically correct paths. If there are more than one possible hit, then you can choose out of a selection of ROMs. Standard & advanced search options.

game.name: File Manager
game.desc: Basic ASCII file manager for Linux allowing you to browse, copy, delete and move files.

game.name: GPIO Shutdown Utility
game.desc: The GPIO shutdown script has already been installed on this base image. This script will allow a momentary pusbutton to power on or power off the Raspberry Pi. The script is setup to have the pushbutton wired to GPIO pins 5 and 6. One press will shutdown and one press will power back on.

game.name: Reference Utility Menu, DM
game.desc: Find out common information about Retropie, Emulation Station, Attract Mode, RetroArch and ROM information.

game.name: Kodi Repair
game.desc: This script will repair kodi launching(emulator.cfg on retropie/configs).

game.name: ES Collection List Generator
game.desc: This will add or update the custom collection gamelist that will be used to show games in the custom collections menu items.

game.name: ES Gamelist Utility
game.desc: This script is for installing premade, prescraped Emulation Station gamelist.xml files. The script also provides a cleanup utility to audit existing gamelist.xml files against existing rom files to end up with a gamelist.xml file only containing entries for matching rom files. The premade gamelist files are setup for No Intro filenames like EmuMovies, Hyperspin, Launchbox. They are also setup to use the four folders for PNG/MP4 media. boxart cart snap wheel The premade gamelist files contain multiple entries per game to account for all known filename extensions supported by the particular system.

game.name: Retroarch
game.desc: Launches the RetroArch GUI so you can change RetroArch options. Note: Changes will not be saved unless you have enabled the "Save Configuration On Exit" option.

game.name: RetroArch Net Play
game.desc: Set up RetroArch Netplay options, choose host or client, port, host IP, delay frames, and your nickname.

game.name: RunCommand Settings
game.desc: Change what appears on the runcommand screen. Enable or disable the menu, enable or disable box art and change CPU configuration.

game.name: Update & Upgrade OS
game.desc: You can update and upgrade your OS in one click!

game.name: USB Roms On/Off
game.desc: Dual script! You can choose to expand the roms file system to an external USB MSD or disable it. External MSD needs to be in NTFS format. Note: When you change ext USB you need to run removal script and then connect and enable the new drive.

game.name: WiFi
game.desc: Connect to or disconnect from a wifi network and configure wifi settings. On Pi4 you might need to set location.

game.name: / Audio Tools
game.desc: This folder contains Sound related scripts.

game.name: / Visual Tools
game.desc: This folder contains Visuals related scripts.

game.name: Audio Settings
game.desc: Configure audio settings. Choose default to Auto, 3.5mm Jack or HDMI. Mixer controls, and apply default settings.

game.name: Bezel Custom Sets
game.desc: You can enable or disable custom folder bezels such as Motion Blue #2 set or future sets.

game.name: Alterative Background Music Setup
game.desc: Enabled on Retropie ! You can remove or re-install the background music. If removed, run the relative fix in Retropie Toolkit to disable BGM when an emulator starts. NOTE: It won't delete your music folder!

game.name: Music On/Off
game.desc: Mute or unmute the background music.

game.name: Bluetooth
game.desc: Register and connect to Bluetooth devices. Unregister, remove devices and display registered & connected devices.

game.name: Supreme Marquee Tool
game.desc: The supreme marquee tool is a all in one place to set up your marquee.

game.name: Bootup Theme Randomizer
game.desc: Utility to enable or disable random themes upon Emulation Station bootup.

game.name: No Audio Fixes
game.desc: No Audio HDMI configuration audio fixes By EASY HAX.

game.name: No Audio Fix - Apply 1st!
game.desc: Try first this HDMI configuration audio fix By EASY HAX.

game.name: No Audio Fix - Force 720p
game.desc: Second HDMI configuration audio fix By EASY HAX.

game.name: No Audio Fix - Force 1080p
game.desc: Third HDMI configuration audio fix By EASY HAX.

game.name: Hursty's Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update Hursty's EmulationStation themes.

game.name: RetroArch Shaders On/Off
game.desc: Enable or disable your RetroArch shaders.

game.name: Video smooth script
game.desc: Enable or Disable video smoothing. This may fix screen tearing in emulators if found.

game.name: Video smooth script
game.desc: The all in one RetroArch Video Tweak script.

game.name: Mp4 Launching Screens
game.desc: Disable or enable launching mp4 screen prior loading a rom. Or enable the launching mp4 screens per system. Requires the systems mp4 to exist in the RetroPie/extras+/mp4 folder and match PlayBox system names.

game.name: Launching Screens
game.desc: This script will enable or disable the use of launching screens. Launching screensets are located here: /home/pi/RetroPie/LaunchingScreens Each set of launching screens you have located there must be in their own parent folder, with the individual emulator system folders containing the launching.png files underneath.

game.name: loading-Launching Screens Tool
game.desc: This script will enable or disable the use of launching screens. Launching screensets are located here: /home/pi/RetroPie/LaunchingScreens Each set of launching screens you have located there must be in their own parent folder, with the individual emulator system folders containing the launching.png files underneath.

game.name: Media Removal Util
game.desc: This utility will remove extra media files (mixart, boxart, cartart, snap and wheel) for a chosen system when there is not a matching game/rom for it. Mixart tweak added.

game.name: RetroPie Video Loading screen
game.desc: Enable or Disable video loading screen.

game.name: System Unified Launching Videos
game.desc: Utility to enable or disable the unified system launching videos.

game.name: ES Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update EmulationStation themes. Officialy supported themes can be previewed at https://github.com/retropie/RetroPie-Setup/wiki/themes.

game.name: Bezel Project
game.desc: Download and manage games bezels.

game.name: System Info & Weather
game.desc: View a summary of your Retropie system info, temperature, partition info, ip, weather etc.! PLEASE GIVE TIME TO GATHER INFO.

game.name: Background Music
game.desc: The mpg123 music script has been installed in this build to play MP3/WAV files during menu navigation in both Emulation Station and Attract Mode. A special folder in /roms has been created called music. This folder is used to place your MP3/WAV files into. Once done, restart the system and they will begin automatically playing. Once you launch a game, the music will stop. Upon exiting out of a game, the music will begin playing again.

game.name: What is my IP?
game.desc: Displays your current IP address, as well as other information provided by the command, "ip addr show."

game.name: OverClock Optimized
game.desc: Overclock your Pi4 with N64 optimization in mind.

game.name: OverScan On/Off
game.desc: This script will let quickly enable or disable the overscan setting.

game.name: RetroPie Tweak
game.desc: This easy to use script lets you pick what layout you want.

game.name: Raspberry Video Output
game.desc: This script will let quickly let you change video output. Some ex 1080P,720P,480P,240P.

game.name: Raspberry Video Output
game.desc: This utility will let you choose between various forced screen resolutions and ratio.

game.name: Basic system info
game.desc: Displays the most basic system info.

game.name: Joystick Selection
game.desc: Select which joystick to use for RetroArch players 1-4 (global or system specific).

game.name: Joystick Selection
game.desc: Select which joystick to use for RetroArch players 1-4 (global or system specific).

game.name: Controller Selection Script, Meleu
game.desc: Lets the user define which controller to use for RetroArch players 1-4, global and system specific. The joystick selection has two methods of work: 1) selection by joystick index and 2) by joystick name.

game.name: USB Boot Mode
game.desc: This will enable the permanent USB Boot Mode on Pi4 Model. You can boot a USB device with no SD card needed or any further changes.

game.name: Skyscraper
game.desc: A powerful and versatile yet easy to use game scraper. Supports EmulationStation & Attract Mode, 61+ systems. Written by Lars Muldjord.

game.name: Splash Screens
game.desc: Enable or disable the RetroPie splashscreen during boot. Choose a splashscreen, download new splashscreens or return splashscreen to default.

game.name: Supreme Online Tool
game.desc: The supreme online tool offers supreme build tweaks and improvemts using the supreme sever. [ **Must have a internet connection to use** ]

game.name: Switch To Attract Mode
game.desc: Enable and switch to Attract Mode FrontEnd.

game.name: +Start Amiberry
game.desc: Configure Amiberry Amiga Emulator

game.name: FIX MY BUILD
game.desc: Fix all your broken SUPREME BUILD features. Update, maintenance tools and many more. This Supreme Toolkit runs also from cli so you can use Skyscraper and open Raspbian desktop. (This tool will also let you fix your RetroPie Menu after a update)

game.name: RetroPie Setup
game.desc: Install RetroPie from binary or source, install experimental packages, additional drivers, edit Samba shares, custom scraper, as well as other RetroPie-related configurations.

game.name: sinden lightgun menu
game.desc: This Script Lets You Start, Stop, And Test Sinden Lightgun For Player 1 And Player 2.

game.name: Sinden Lightgun Test P2
game.desc: This script will let you test Sinden Lightgun P2.

game.name: Sinden Lightgun Test P1
game.desc: This script will let you test Sinden Lightgun P1.

game.name: Sinden Lightgun Start P2
game.desc: This script will let you start Sinden Lightgun P2.

game.name: Sinden Lightgun Start P1
game.desc: This script will let you Start Sinden Lightgun P1.

game.name: Sinden Lightguns Stop
game.desc: This script will let you stop Sinden Lightguns.

game.name: Audio
game.desc: Configure audio settings. Choose default of auto, 3.5mm jack, or HDMI. Mixer controls, and apply default settings.

game.name: Bluetooth
game.desc: Register and connect to Bluetooth devices. Unregister and remove devices, and display registered and connected devices.

game.name: Configuration Editor
game.desc: Change common RetroArch options, and manually edit RetroArch configs, global configs, and non-RetroArch configs.

game.name: ES Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update EmulationStation themes. Most themes can be previewed at https://retropie.org.uk/docs/Themes/.

game.name: File Manager
game.desc: Basic ASCII file manager for Linux allowing you to browse, copy, delete, and move files.

game.name: Retroarch
game.desc: Launches the RetroArch GUI so you can change RetroArch options. Note: Changes will not be saved unless you have enabled the "Save Configuration On Exit" option.

game.name: RetroArch Net Play
game.desc: Set up RetroArch Netplay options, choose host or client, port, host IP, delay frames, and your nickname.

game.name: Run Command Configuration
game.desc: Change what appears on the runcommand screen. Enable or disable the menu, enable or disable box art, and change CPU configuration.

game.name: Show IP
game.desc: Displays your current IP address, as well as other information provided by the command "ip addr show."

game.name: Splash Screens
game.desc: Enable or disable the splashscreen on RetroPie boot. Choose a splashscreen, download new splashscreens, and return splashscreen to default.

game.name: TAMO+
game.desc: TAMO+ Theme and Music Overlay Plus, much more. This script changes between Themes and their Background Music. Plus many scripts for themes downloading, visual and audio tools and much, much more.

game.name: WiFi
game.desc: Connect to or disconnect from a WiFi network and configure WiFi settings.

game.name: FE Switcheroo
game.desc: This script will let you pick your boot up front-end and so much more.
